Text.val: 18.03.2013 SH SCR18024 Changed GB101.PI.TRIGGER = 1 into 11 (at all places where GB101 is called)
09.02.2010 SH SCR15320 Changed GB101.PI.CALLINGPROGRAM = BDC142 in
BDC146 and fixed bug in H3 where V.TOBOOKC is initialized
H1. Test if for reverse factoring clients the invoices which were blocked for
H2. Test if for reverse factoring clients the correction invoices which were
blocked for finance can be financed now
H3. Test if for reverse factoring clients the invoices which were
blocked for finance can be compensated with credit notes

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO.INVO_NO, INVO.INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA.INVA_ACTASPECIAL from :1/INVA INVA, :1/INVO INVO, :1/CLNT CLNT where INVO.INVO_NO = INVA.INVA_NO and INVA.INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT.CLNT108_ACC_CURR and CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = INVO.INVO_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = INVO.INVO_CLNTNO and INVO.INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO.INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :3 and INVO.INVO_AACTUALI < 0 and INVA.INVA_ACTASPECIAL < 0 order by INVO.INVO_NO

select INVO.INVO_NO, INVO.INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA.INVA_ACTAFACTORING from :1/INVA INVA, :1/INVO INVO, :1/CLNT CLNT where INVO.INVO_NO = INVA.INVA_NO and INVA.INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT.CLNT108_ACC_CURR and CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = INVO.INVO_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = INVO.INVO_CLNTNO and INVO.INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and (INVO.INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :3 or INVO.INVO_MARKCODESPEC = 0) and INVO.INVO_AACTUALI < 0 and INVA.INVA_ACTAFACTORING < 0 order by INVO.INVO_NO
